name: semtools (run-llama)
description: [项目级] Semantic search and document parsing tools for the command line。来源: https://github.com/run-llama/semtools

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content: semtools ask "What are the main findings?" papers/*.txt

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:
CONTRIBUTING.md
Cargo.lock
Cargo.toml
LICENSE
README.md
benchmarks
benchmarks/arxiv
cli
cli/ask.js
cli/parse.js
cli/search.js
cli/workspace.js
example_semtools_config.json
examples
examples/example_CLAUDE.md
examples/use_with_coding_agents.md
examples/use_with_mcp.md
package-lock.json
package.json
scripts

genes.title: 使用方法
genes.content:
- [Using Semtools with Coding Agents](examples/use_with_coding_agents.md)
- [Using Semtools with MCP](examples/use_with_mcp.md)

genes.title: 核心特性
genes.content:
- **Fast semantic search** using model2vec embeddings from [minishlab/potion-multilingual-128M](https://huggingface.co/minishlab/potion-multilingual-128M)
- **Reliable document parsing** with caching and error handling  
- **Unix-friendly** design with proper stdin/stdout handling
- **Configurable** distance thresholds and returned chunk sizes
- **Multi-format support** for parsing documents (PDF, DOCX, PPTX, etc.)
- **Concurrent processing** for better parsing performance
- **Workspace management** for efficient document retrieval over large collections

name: semtools/cli 模块
description: [模块级] semtools 项目的 cli 模块 (source)。来源: https://github.com/run-llama/semtools

genes.title: cli 模块说明
genes.content:
```bash
$ semtools parse --help
A CLI tool for parsing documents using various backends

Usage: semtools parse [OPTIONS] <FILES>...

Arguments:
  <FILES>...  Files to parse

Options:
  -c, --config <CONFIG>    Path to the config file. Defaults to ~/.semtools_config.json
  -b, --backend <BACKEND>  The backend type to use for parsing. Defaults to `llama-parse` [default: llama-parse]
  -v, --verbose            Verbose output while parsing
  -h, --help               Print help
```

```bash
$ semtool

genes.title: cli 代码示例
genes.content:
$ semtools parse --help
A CLI tool for parsing documents using various backends

Usage: semtools parse [OPTIONS] <FILES>...

  -b, --backend <BACKEND>  The backend type to use for parsing. Defaults to `llama-parse` [default: llama-parse]
  -v, --verbose            Verbose output while parsing
  -h, --help               Print help
